ModMetaData.name: Better Bridges Pack

ModMetaData.description:
Idea from Lanilors mod - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1420241138

And you can paint them all!
Better Bridges Pack - now with fishing bucket!
